author: mmusich
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunII simulation
- **RunII Ideal scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_design_v17](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v17) as [80X_mcRun2_design_v16](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v16) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v17/80X_mcRun2_design_v16): 
  - fixed `AlCaRecoTriggerBit` for `EcalTrg` AlCaReco
- **RunII CRAFT scenario** : [80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v15](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v15) as [80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v14](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v14) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v15/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v14): 
  - fixed `AlCaRecoTriggerBit` for `EcalTrg` AlCaReco
- **RunII Asymptotic scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v17](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v17) as [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v16](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v16) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v17/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v16): 
  - fixed `AlCaRecoTriggerBit` for `EcalTrg` AlCaReco
- **RunII Startup scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_startup_v16](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v16) as [80X_mcRun2_startup_v15](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v15) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v16/80X_mcRun2_startup_v15): 
  - fixed `AlCaRecoTriggerBit` for `EcalTrg` AlCaReco
- **RunII Heavy Ions scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v10](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v10) as [80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v9) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v10/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v9): 
  - fixed `AlCaRecoTriggerBit` for `EcalTrg` AlCaReco
title: Fix failure due to AlCaEcalTrg missing triggerbit in 80X MC relvals
